Title: Drop Dead Fred
Writer: Elizabeth Livingston (story), Carlos Davis, Anthony Fingleton
Actors: Phoebe Cates, Rik Mayall, Marsha Mason, Tim Matheson
Plot: A young woman who's attempting to find her place in the world battles with her controlling mother and a womanizing husband finds comfort and confusion with the appearance of her childhood friend. It is a zappy movie that emphasizes self-actualization.
Production: New Line Cinema, PolyGram Filmed Entertainment
